author: Jose Arzac
comment: I kept activating my smartwatch when I crossed my arms and messing up the watchface or opening an app. With Lockable, I now don't have to worry about touching the screen unintentionally any more.  The only problem that I have, and that is the reason why I don't give it 5 stars, is because the Transparency option doesn't work on my LG Urbane 2. It makes my screen glow when is locked, and it's not transparent. I can't see my watchface behind the lock screen.  Otherwise it's a great app. I believe that this is functionality that should be part of Android Wear.

author: Charles dek
comment: The reason I installed Lockable is because I cross my arms a lot without sleeves. It messes up my watch every time, but with lockable it doesn't! I would suggest one thing tho, make an invisible lock screen, so I can see the time better when just touching the screen, that would be even better! (Same as the "Swipe" lock, but without the dots and lock icon)
title: Almost perfect!

author: Ricardo Molina
comment: Y just Installed and bought different lock options and only swipe which is free works!!!  Developer,  please tell me what I'm doing wrong.  Transparency doesn't work also. UPDATE : Got it to work,  only transparency issue exists.
title: Doesn"t work on my Moto 360

author: Gustavo
comment: The best lock out here! Just need a tweak, is to let refuse accept calls because code gets over a call on wear.

author: Joanne T
comment: Doesn't  lock after restarting the watch.. Or am I missing something? Other than that perfect.
title: No lock on restart

author: Rodney Glasbergen
comment: I like the app.   It prevents some accidental touches.   Might be nice to have it disabled while charging though.

author: Col Kinsey
comment: Why haven't you listed what the update is for? Very Lagg.  Not recommended.

author: Quantrè Rockett
comment: I think it needs haptic feedback but other then that it works fine

author: Alan Feekery
comment: This screen lock feature is something that is badly needed with Android Wear, this app is invaluable.
title: Superb!

author: Leon Luong
comment: Personally, I would like to be able to lock it by opening the app on the watch.
title: Lock by opening the app

author: Alex Spinelli
comment: Cool way to add security on android wear, love the transparent theme

author: April Custins
comment: Worth the 1.99! Great app!

author: Brian Morrison
comment: Since my G Watch got Android Wear 5.0.1 Lockable has become less responsive and less smooth. Often doesn't lock automatically and unlock stutters using circle drag
title: Nice functions, but...

author: Jared Cooperband
comment: Hello, I request 2 features 1. lock automatically when connection between phone+watch is broken (a leash) 2. lock automatically when phone is first turned on  thanks
title: feature request

author: Efthimios Floros
comment: Lock screen transparency works on initial install then doesn't work. Now I see a black box and the lock icon , no update since my last review, and since I only want the lock so my jacket sleave doesn't turn the screen on by contact at work I can just use the theater mode which is much more convenient. Sorry but down to 2 stars and uninstalled.
title: Locks but ...

author: Mark Stahl
comment: I just installed on an LG G watch R.  My hope was to have a screen lock that prevents accidental touches, for example, from my children while I'm holding them.  So what I really want is to be able to see the watch face at all times, just for it NOT to be active.   This almost works, but not reliably.  The transparency feature worked once, but then stopped after I played with config.  When the watch is idle, the screen is grey.  When the watch is active, the screen is also grey.  I'd like to be able to check the time without unlocking the watch.   (I'm using the swipe to unlock method, so I should have no trouble reading the clock under the lock symbol, if only it were transparent.)  Another minor quibble is that the swipe screen appears to be drawn for square faces.  On round faces, it shows as a black box surrounded by grey.    Please improve, as you're on the right track!  Will adjust my review accordingly.  Thanks!
title: Close, but can't see time while screen is locked

author: Jacob Serrano
comment: Since latest update the lock screen is not transparent on the Moto 360, despite that option being selected in the app.
title: Not transparent

author: Tracy pullen
comment: Still can't lock by swiping down would be a great option when I try it just mutes my 360 will give 5 stars when fixed
title: Moto 360

author: Mateo Barriga
comment: It doesn't work
title: LG g watch

comment: It's not something I would use constantly but it works very well! This is to support the Dev.
title: It works very well.

author: Miguel Gargallo Llamas
comment: The watch is locked and... I can say... "Ok google"and do what I want locked!,
title: Why?

author: Sean Donovan
comment: looks good guys
title: Fixed Moto 360

author: Jonny Campbell
comment: Looks great has potential but moto 360 already has a function for when you pull down from top of screen so only locks 1 out of 20 times fix that and great

reply.author: Mohammad Adib
reply.content: Should be fixed! Make sure to update Lockable and open the app on the watch!

title: Not really for moto 360

author: Bryan van der Paardt
comment: Great app. One thing I would like to see is more of a transparent or completely transparent so when I am just looking at the time it doesn't get in the way as much. I love the app though and its exactly what I needed because I'm used to adjusting my watch on my wrist ( none smart watch). With his one I kept getting into menus on accident.
title: This should have been part of the OS!

author: James Hablewitz
comment: The actual look n design are very good. I chose this over another one because of that, but I don't use auto lock I use manual by swiping down which never wants to work. 9 out a 10 times the screen for muting comes up. Wish u could choose where to swipe to lock.
title: I like but...

author: Vito C
comment: Swipe from top doesn't work on the moto 360. Oh and the enable settings on the 360 is sideways.  Also it basically doesn't look right at all on the 360.  Please make it compatible!!

reply.author: Mohammad Adib
reply.content: Should be fixed :) please retry and update your review if possible

title: Not really Moto 360 compatible.

author: Michael Burke
comment: Is it possible to change lock screen mode on the watch automatically like if I have an app that unlocks the phone when I'm home and locks it when I leave or make it ask for a pin when BT Disconnects
title: Cool

author: Marc Schermesser
comment: rly nice app! it's a must have app and i am totally ok with the inapp purchase, if you want pattern or pin. The Price is IMO ok.  this app has a wonderfull look, on the phone and on the watch, thanks again for your work!
title: perfect app, thanks!

author: Gary Davisson
comment: Simple swipe is much better than up, down, back, sideways, upside, A, B, X.
title: Love the swipe to unlock

author: Camilo
comment: As usual, he did a good job. However, not willing to pay for new lock options.
title: Awesome

comment: Great to use of you wear watch in shower.
title: Very good

author: Sahas Katta
comment: This app will change your life.

author: Ray L Jackson Sr
comment: Ugly and doesn't work reliably. Showear works fine though.

author: Austin Otto
comment: I have to log into the app every morning to get it to lock my device for the day. I used this to see if it works everytime but I wont purchase until it works without me having to sign into the app to reset lockscreen actually locking
title: Really?

author: Intravenus De Milo
comment: Downloaded this, but never used it. Today after taking watch off charger noticed app had hijacked my watch and locked me out of it. Had to uninstall to use watch.
title: Absolute garbage.

comment: Have set to transparent, yet it shows black... I want to know what time it is without swiping...
title: Black box

comment: Another amazing app....love this
